"I am speaking ze truce," replied the hussar with a smile. 
"It's all about the war," the count shouted down the table. "You know my son's going, Mdrya Dmftrievna? My son is going." 
"I have four sons in the army but still I don't fret. It is all in God's hands. You may die in your bed or God may spare you in a battle," re- plied Mdrya Dmftrievna's deep voice, which easily carried the whole length of the table. 
"That's true!"
